DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study confirm efficacy CS-8958 administer single inhale low dose single inhale high dose show non-inferiority oseltamivir phosphate use time alleviation influenza illness . For safety evaluation , between-group comparison make regard incidence adverse event safety measure . In secondary objective , optimum dosage CS-8958 indication evaluate base efficacy safety single inhale low high dose .
DOC.brief_title: A Multinational Phase III Study CS-8958 ( MARVEL )
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis influenza Axillary temperature > = 37.5 degree C Infection bacteria specie and/or virus influenza virus Chronic respiratory disease Renal dysfunction
